channel.title: Intro on Seth dot cool
channel.description: Recent content in Intro on Seth dot cool

item.title: Welcome to the least-cool dot-cool on the Internet
item.description: I registered the seth.cool domain a couple of years ago with no project in mind – only the misguided assumptions that (1) someone else would buy it, and (2) that I am cool. I’ve decided to finally use my first-mover’s advantage to share data-related projects as I work on them. A brief background on that: As my job has evolved to include more and more data analysis, I’ve found myself spending a lot of time waiting for Excel to unfreeze respond.
